long_description: An essential for any paddling kit, the handy Seattle Sports Splitshot Throw Bag offers an extra measure of safety on flatwater and rafting trips. Large cordlock ensures quick openings, and a big grab handle makes it easy for panicked swimmers to grab on. Houses 50 ft. of 5/16 in. floating, polypropylene rope; rope is soft and pliable, making it easy to work with. Whistleloc(R) buckle functions as an emergency high-decibel whistle. QuickStuff system uses pinky loops on the bag to allow you to use both hands when reloading rope. Mesh panel allows quick drainage while foam insert keeps bag afloat. Seattle Sports Splitshot Throw Bag has a reflective panel to increase visibility.
short_description: An essential for any paddling kit, the handy Seattle Sports Splitshot Throw Bag offers an extra measure of safety on flatwater and rafting trips.
